numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice that there are not many head coaches of color.
4. I wonder whether head coaches of color are discriminated against because of their color.
5. I also wonder whether this situation is only a coincidence.
6. There are many players of color in the leagues.
7. I do not think that everything has to do with race.
8. You ask what impact this has on me and my community.
9. This has no impact on me and my community.
10. I think that if a person works hard then this person can do anything.
11. I think that race does not matter.
12. I think that if race matters nowadays then this is stupid.
13. You ask what is going on in the graph.
14. The graph shows that many players are people of color.
15. The graph also shows that most head coaches are white people.
17. Why are many players people of color but most head coaches are white people?
